# timingMode

**Instance Property**

The timing mode used to execute an action.

## Declaration

```swift
var timingMode: SCNActionTimingMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNActionTimingMode]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNActionTimingMode/linear].

## Adjusting an Action’s Animation Properties

- **duration**: The duration required to complete an action.
- **speed**: A speed factor that modifies how fast an action runs.
- **timingFunction**: A block SceneKit calls to determine the action’s animation timing.
